import React, { useState, useEffect } from "react"; import { fetchPersonDetail, fetchSimilarMovie, } from "../../service"; import "react-bootstrap-carousel/dist/react-bootstrap-carousel.css"; import ReactStars from "react-rating-stars-component"; import { Link } from "react-router-dom"; import "../home/Aminition/Home.css"; export function Person({ match }) { let params = match.params; const [detail, setDetail] = useState([]); const [similarMovie, setSimilarMovie] = useState([]); useEffect(() => { const fetchAPI = async () => { setDetail(await fetchPersonDetail(params.id)); setSimilarMovie(await fetchSimilarMovie(params.id)); }; fetchAPI(); }, [params.id]); const similarMovieList = similarMovie.slice(0, 4).map((item, index) => { return (
